title: Charlotte Douglas Airport Increases Parking Rates
summary: Parking rates at Charlotte Douglas Airport are increasing, with proceeds reinvested in parking facilities.
charlotte_impact: Impacts travelers and airport users; funds will improve safety and infrastructure.

title: Neshé Conley Advances Maternal Health Equity with AI
summary: WCNC Charlotte highlights Neshé Conley, founder of Ebony Women Health Corp, using AI to address maternal health disparities.
charlotte_impact: Addresses critical health disparities and leverages technology for social good.

title: Warmer Weather Arrives for Meteorological Spring
summary: Sunday will bring patchy fog in the morning, followed by sunshine and temperatures in the 70s.
charlotte_impact: Marks the beginning of spring with pleasant weather conditions.

title: NC Lawmakers Divided Over US-Israel Strikes on Iran
summary: NC Republicans support the Iran strikes, while Democratic lawmakers deem them unconstitutional.
charlotte_impact: Reflects political polarization and differing views on foreign policy.

title: Sinkhole Swallows Pickup Truck in Gastonia
summary: A sinkhole near Airline and Brown in Gastonia swallowed an unattended truck overnight; no injuries were reported.
charlotte_impact: Highlights infrastructure issues and potential safety hazards.

title: Charlotte Protesters Rally Against Iran Strikes
summary: A protest against U.S.-Israeli military strikes on Iran is scheduled for 4 p.m. at Romare Bearden Park.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates local opposition to international military actions.

title: Huntersville Plans to Address Congested Corridor
summary: Huntersville is planning to address traffic congestion on NC-115, a major artery experiencing standstill traffic during rush hour.

title: Early Voting Ends Saturday for NC Primary Elections
summary: North Carolina residents have until 3 p.m. Saturday to vote early in the pivotal primary elections.
charlotte_impact: Informs residents about the deadline for early voting.

title: Overnight Shooting in East Charlotte Leaves One Critically Injured
summary: A shooting in the 6500 block of E W.T. Harris Boulevard in east Charlotte resulted in one person critically injured.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about public safety and gun violence.

title: I-485 Express Lanes Open in Charlotte
summary: The I-485 Express Lanes in south Charlotte are now open, offering a faster option between I-77 and U.S. 74.
charlotte_impact: Provides commuters with a potentially faster route.

title: Woman Dies Weeks After Assault in East Charlotte
summary: A woman has died weeks after being assaulted in east Charlotte. The suspect is in custody.
charlotte_impact: Highlights violent crime and its consequences.

title: Mother and Boyfriend Accused of Assaulting 1-Year-Old
summary: A mother and her boyfriend are accused of assaulting a 1-year-old in Burke County, causing a fractured arm.
charlotte_impact: Concerns about child abuse and domestic violence.

title: CMPD Targets South Charlotte Crime Hotspots
summary: CMPD is targeting crime hotspots in South Charlotte with 'Queen City Safe' patrols as part of a rebranded safety initiative.
charlotte_impact: Aims to reduce crime and improve public safety.

title: Man Sentenced for Sexually Abusing a Girl
summary: Maurice Limon Stitt, 42, was sentenced for sexually abusing a girl, with the abuse continuing even after she disclosed it.

title: Driver Kills Another in Rock Hill Crash After High-Speed Exit
summary: Joel Laron Smith, 21, is charged with reckless homicide after a crash on I-77 in Rock Hill.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the dangers of reckless driving.
